edu.ucla.sspace.hadoop
Class CooccurrenceExtractor

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.hadoop.CooccurrenceExtractor

public class CooccurrenceExtractor
extends Object

An common implementation that provides functionality for processing a Text document and recording word co-occurrences to a Mapper.Context.

This class defines the following configurable properties that may be set using Properties constructor to HadoopJob. Note that setting these properties with the System properties will have no effect on this class.

Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.hadoop.CooccurrenceExtractor.windowSize"
Default: 2
This property sets the number of words before and after that are counted as co-occurring. With the default value, 2 words are counted before and 2 words are counter after. This class always uses a symmetric window.

Field Summary
static int DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE
          The default window size if none is specified.
static String WINDOW_SIZE_PROPERTY
          The property used to configure the Mapper instances' window size, which counts the number of words to view before and after each word in focus.

          Creates an unconfigured CooccurrenceMapper.

Field Detail

WINDOW_SIZE_PROPERTY

public static final String WINDOW_SIZE_PROPERTY
The property used to configure the Mapper instances' window size, which counts the number of words to view before and after each word in focus.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE

public static final int DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE
The default window size if none is specified. Note that this value is never used, but is provided as the default value when calling Configuration#getInt(String, int) to get the actual window size.

Method Detail

processDocument

public void processDocument(Text document,
                            .Context context)
                     throws IOException,
                            InterruptedException
Takes the document and writes a set of tuples mapping a word to the other words it co-occurs with and the relative position of those co-occurrences.

Parameters:
document - the document that will be segmented into tokens and mapped to cooccurrences
context - the context in which this mapper is executing
Throws:
IOException
InterruptedException
